) VALUES (
#{delivery_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{delivery_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

#{is_dir,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{dir_dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{dir_dept_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,

)

INSERT INTO SUP_DELIVERY_MAIN ( delivery_id , delivery_no , group_id , hos_id , copy_code , acc_year , acc_month , sup_id , sup_no , create_date , check_date , bill_type , hos_id_in , is_dir , dir_dept_id , dir_dept_no , delivery_address , delivery_url , in_state , state , ) select SUP_DELIVERY_MAIN_SEQ.nextval , t.* from(
select
#{item.delivery_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.acc_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.acc_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.sup_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.sup_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.create_date,jdbcType=DATE} , #{item.check_date,jdbcType=DATE} , #{item.bill_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.hos_id_in,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.is_dir,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.dir_dept_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.dir_dept_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.delivery_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.delivery_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{item.in_state,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{item.state,jdbcType=INTEGER} , from dual
)t
mapper.select: SELECT t1.delivery_id, t1.delivery_no, t1.group_id, t1.hos_id, t1.copy_code, t1.acc_year, t1.acc_month, t1.sup_id, t1.sup_no, sup_code, sup_name, t1.create_date, t1.check_date, t1.bill_type, t1.hos_id_in, t1.is_dir, t1.dir_dept_id, t1.dir_dept_no, t1.delivery_address, t1.delivery_url, t1.in_state, t1.state FROM sup_delivery_main t1 left join hos_sup_dict t2 on t2.group_id = t1.group_id and t2.hos_id = t1.hos_id and t2.sup_id = t1.sup_id and t2.sup_no = t1.sup_no and t2.is_stop=0 WHERE t1.delivery_no = #{delivery_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t1.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.acc_year = #{acc_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t1.acc_month = #{acc_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
